LOGIN.NO_MORE: Find user studies. The best user studies. It's true.
LOGIN.FIND: We have the greatest user studies in the world. Believe me.
LOGIN.NO_ACCOUNT: You don't have an account yet?
LOGIN.REGISTRATION_SUCCESS: Registration successful! To log in, please click on the verification link in your email.
LOGIN.VERIFICATION_SUCCESS: Verification successful! You can now log in.
LOGIN.MORE_TEXT: With Frozen Sea you can create and manage or particpiate in studies. Studies are filtered for you personally and experiment hours are registered automatically.

REGISTER.NO_MORE: Find user studies. The best user studies. It's true.
REGISTER.FIND: We have the greatest user studies in the world. Believe me.
REGISTER.ERROR: Sign up failed, your username might be taken or there is already an account with this e-mail address!
REGISTER.ERROR_USERNAME: Sign up failed, your username is already taken!
REGISTER.ERROR_EMAIL: Sign up failed, there already exists an account with this e-mail address!
REGISTER.ERROR_EMAIL_USERNAME: Sign up failed, your username is already taken and there exists an account with this e-mail address!
REGISTER.MORE_TEXT: With Frozen Sea you can create and manage or particpiate in studies. Studies are filtered for you personally and experiment hours are registered automatically.

RESET_PASSWORD.NO_EMAIL: There exists no account with this email
RESET_PASSWORD.SUCCESS_EMAIL: An email for resetting your password was sent to you
RESET_PASSWORD.SUCCESS_RESET: Your password has been reseted successfully. You can now login with your new password
RESET_PASSWORD.NO_MATCH: The entered passwords do not match
RESET_PASSWORD.OLD_TOKEN: Your passwort reset email is not current. Please request an new one.

CREATE_STUDY.TITLE: Title
CREATE_STUDY.TITLE_MESSAGE: Please enter a meaningful study title
CREATE_STUDY.DESCRIPTION_LENGTH: Please stick to a maximum of 600 characters
CREATE_STUDY.DURATION_MESSAGE: Please enter the duration of a study appointment
CREATE_STUDY.DURATION_MIN: Please enter a duration of at least 10 Minutes
CREATE_STUDY.LOCATION_MESSAGE: Please enter all locations of the study
CREATE_STUDY.ADVISER_MESSAGE: Please enter the name of your supervisor
CREATE_STUDY.AMOUNT_MESSAGE: Please enter the amount of money for participating in the study
CREATE_STUDY.VOUCHER_AMOUNT_MESSAGE: Please enter the gift card amount for participating in the study
CREATE_STUDY.HOURS_AMOUNT_MESSAGE: Please enter the number of experiment hours for participating in the study
CREATE_STUDY.STUDY_START_MESSAGE: Please enter the study begin as follows DD.MM.YYYY
CREATE_STUDY.STUDY_END_MESSAGE: Please enter the study end as follows DD.MM.YYYY
CREATE_STUDY.APPOINTMENT_TIME_MESSAGE: Please enter the start time of the appointment
CREATE_STUDY.APPOINTMENT_DAY_MESSAGE: Please enter the date of the appointment
CREATE_STUDY.APPOINTMENT_DEADLINE_MESSAGE: Please enter the deadline for applying to the study appointment
CREATE_STUDY.APPOINTMENT_DEADLINE_MIN: Please enter a deadline of at least one hour prior to the begin of the study appointment
CREATE_STUDY.APPOINTMENT_LOCATION_MESSAGE: Please choose a location for the appointment that you specified above
CREATE_STUDY.REQUIREMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Please enter the requirements that students must fulfill to participate in your study. Based on these requirements we will show your study only to suitable applicants.
CREATE_STUDY.REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please enter all the required information.
CREATE_STUDY.EXPLANATION_1: Before participants are able to register, your supervisor has to  unlock your study. Your supervisor has been notified automatically.
CREATE_STUDY.EXPLANATION_2: When your study has been unlocked, you will be able to accept and reject Participants in the detail view of your study.
CREATE_STUDY.EXPLANATION_3: After a successful participation you need to pay the chosen reward and confirm the participation afterwards.
CREATE_STUDY.EXPLANATION_4: However, if a participant does not show up as planned, you have to note this in the detail-view.
CREATE_STUDY.EXPLANATION_5: Experiment hours are entered automatically after you confirm a participation.
CREATE_STUDY.DELETE_1: Do you want to delete your study
CREATE_STUDY.ADVISER_NOT_LISTED: If your supervisor is not listed, please send him or her an email
CREATE_STUDY.SET_PREFERENCES_2: Choose requirements, which participants have to conform to
CREATE_STUDY.SET_GENERAL_INFORMATION_2: Switch back to the gernal information tab

USER_PREFERENCES.TITLE: My preferences
USER_PREFERENCES.STUDY_NOT_EXIST: This study program does not exist at LMU.
USER_PREFERENCES.OS: The operating system of my mobile phone is ...

STUDY_LIST.TITLE: Studies
STUDY_LIST.NOT_APPROVED_STUDY: This study has not been approved by an advisor yet
STUDY_LIST.SUPERVISED_STUDY: This study is supervised by you
STUDY_LIST.SUPERVISED_STUDY_AND_APPROVAL: This study needs approval by you
STUDY_LIST.READY_TO_GO: Your registration for this study has been approved by the study creator
STUDY_LIST.NEEDS_CONFIRM: You have registered for this study, but the study creator hasn not confirmed you yet
STUDY_LIST.SUCCESS: You have successfully participated in this study
STUDY_LIST.FAIL: You registered for this study, but you did not show up
STUDY_LIST.EXAMPLE: Example: Driving behaviour after consumption of milk
STUDY_LIST.WHAT_NAME: What is the name of your study?
STUDY_LIST.CAREFUL: Always carefully read the description and the requirements of a study before you participate!
STUDY_LIST.NO_FOUND: Sorry, we could not find any matching studies.

STUDY_DETAILS.PARTICIPATION_SUCCESSFUL: Appointment reservation successful. You will receive confirmation by mail.
STUDY_DETAILS.PARTICIPATION_FAILED: Reservation failed. You are already participating in this study!
STUDY_DETAILS.COMPLETED: You confired the participant's presence at the appointment. Please make sure he is rewarded accordingly.
STUDY_DETAILS.REWARD_NOT_CHOSEN: Participation failed. Please choose a reward.
STUDY_DETAILS.SUBJECT: Subject
STUDY_DETAILS.MAX_PARTICIPANT_CHANGE_FAILED: The maximum number of participants cannot be lower than the number of participants
STUDY_DETAILS.DELETE_DATE_FAILED: Appointments with participants cannot be deleted.
STUDY_DETAILS.DELETE_STUDY_CONFIRMATION: Deleting this study cannot be undone!
STUDY_DETAILS.STUDY_DELETION_FAILED: A Study with participants cannot be deleted!
STUDY_DETAILS.UNLOCK_MOUSEOVER: As a supervisor, you can unlock this study
STUDY_DETAILS.LOCKED_MOUSEOVER: Your supervisor was already notified. If your study remains locked please contact your supervisor.
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_OWNER_1: After clearance by your supervisor users can apply for your study here. Your supervisor was notified after the study was created.
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_OWNER_2: In this view you can confirm or decline possible participants. A click on the participant's name shows his contact info as well as his chosen reward.
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_OWNER_3: Please confirm the participant's presence at the appointment afterwards and make sure he or she gets his or her chosen reward.
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_OWNER_4: Absence of a participant can also be noted down here.
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_OWNER_5: A click on "Edit Study Details" lets you make subsequent changes to the study. Empty appointments can also be deleted and new appointments can be created
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_1: After choosing a reward, you can apply for an appointment here. You are registered successfully after confirmation by the study organizer.
STUDY_DETAILS.EXPLANATION_2: Please note that rewards will only be distributed to participants whose presence was confirmed by the study organizer.
STUDY_DETAILS.CREATOR: Study organizer
STUDY_DETAILS.ONLINE_ONLY: This study is conducted online and has no appointments. Participation is possible by following the link in the description.
